title: Karrle Tu Bhi Mohabbat
overview: Karan Khanna is a recovering alcoholic who, along with his counsellor Tripurasundari Nagrajan, takes a detoxification trip to Mahabaleshwar. The story takes a turn when he attends his estranged daughter's wedding with Tripurasundari Nagrajan and discovers why opposites truly attract. Will their romance blossom? Or will it be just another page in their contrasting lives?
